name: Save The Princess Mister Knight
description:
Defeat zombies, save the princess!

Command the knight to attack the zombies that are trying to stop the princess from saving the kingdom. Power up the knight between waves to make him stronger.

This game was done as part of the LÖVE GameJam 2023. All assets done by me. LÖVE version used is 11.4.

The complete source code can be found under https://github.com/JCalHij/love-jam-2023
